description: [AcidRain](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1125) identifies specific files and directories in the Linux operating system associated with storage devices.(Citation: AcidRain JAGS 2022)

external_references.description: Juan Andres Guerrero-Saade and Max van Amerongen, SentinelOne. (2022, March 31). AcidRain | A Modem Wiper Rains Down on Europe. Retrieved March 25, 2024.
